ygData.subject: Chief Dooga and the Ogre camp
ygData.msgSnippet: From my experience, Chief Dooga is about level 35. I haven t consed him at this level yet but I ve done so at lvl 30 and 31. He was red to me. The other ogres
ygData.messageBody:
From my experience, Chief Dooga is about level 35.
I haven't consed him at this level yet but I've done
so at lvl 30 and 31. He was red to me. The other
ogres in the camp seem to be in the low 20s at the
most. They were blue to me at lvl 26 when I first
forayed into that area.

Also, the reason I've heard that these ogres cons
amiable is that they have some kind of buff cast
on them benevolence or alliance or the shaman
equivalent of those spells and that's why they cons
amiable. I could be wrong though.



Darrian Ashoka
